summary: A horror-thriller centered on a woman (Wilson) suffering from a medical condition that causes her to sleep her life away, waking briefly on rare occasions.
cast: Sean Young|Patrick Kilpatrick|Dylan McKnight|Cherilyn Wilson|Philip Newby|David Ury|Janet Tracy Keijser|Mekita Faiye|Dov Tiefenbach|Malcolm Foster Smith|Timothy Bottoms|Kathryn Leigh Scott|Brennan Bailey|Danielle Langlois|Valorie Hubbard|Madison Davenport|Louis Graham|David Albert|Zachary Medway|Veronica Hart|Jeff Doucette|Jeffrey Combs|Kent Shocknek|Walter Phelan|Ricardo Medina Jr.|John Landis|Christine Krench|Ronald Hunter|Serah D'Laine|Sean McHugh|Charles Schneider|Eric Valente|Alison Brie|Katherine Carlsberg|David Albert|DB Albert|Enzo Giobbe|Marty Ingels|Jon Janotta|Molli Malone|Matt O'Neill|Leo Quinones
keywords: obsession|hypnosis|sleeping disorder|title spoken by character|reference to wuthering heights the novel
title: Parasomnia
